faqSection.title: Frequently asked questions
faqSection.subtitle: Everything you need to know about CV Maker

faq1.question: Is CV Maker really free?
faq1.answer: Yes, CV Maker is 100% free. You can create, edit and download your CV as PDF at no cost.

faq2.question: Can I edit my CV after creating it?
faq2.answer: Absolutely! Your CVs are saved automatically and you can edit them anytime.

faq3.question: Are templates ATS-compatible?
faq3.answer: Yes, all our templates are optimized for Applicant Tracking Systems used by recruiters.

faq4.question: Can I create multiple CV versions?
faq4.answer: Yes, you can create as many CVs as you like and tailor them for each application.
